title: Product Designer

There's also a possibility to extend the contract. Initial pay for this role is $12.5/hr for up to 20 hours

title: Freelance PHP Developer
description:
A Dubai client is in need of a Vanilla PHP developer for a 1-week project. You will be fixing bugs (on the existing product), while adding some features.

There's a possibility that this could turn into a long term contract!

Stack: PHP, HTML, CSS, & JavaScript, Git & Github

title: Product Designer
description:
A Lagos client is searching for a product designer with experience creating product visions by researching, conceiving, wireframing, sketching, prototyping, and mocking up into intuitive user experiences for digital products. Must have a solid grasp of user-centred design and testing methodologies, subsystems, usability and accessibility concerns.

Tools: Figma, Adobe suite for designs.
